headline: What Ameriprise Financial (AMP)'s Board Appointment of Liane J. Pelletier Means for Shareholders
summary: Ameriprise Financial announced on November 12, 2025, that Liane J. Pelletier, a leader with extensive board and executive experience in telecommunications and technology services, has joined its board of directors and will serve on the Audit and Risk Committee. Pelletier’s appointment brings in deep corporate governance expertise from highly regulated industries, potentially strengthening oversight as Ameriprise continues expanding its asset management and wealth solutions. To understand the...
